front.title: An INVITE-Initiated Dialog Event Package for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: This document defines a dialog event package for the SIP Events architecture, along with a data format used in notifications for this package. The dialog package allows users to subscribe to another user and to receive notification of the changes in state of INVITE-initiated dialog usages in which the subscribed-to user is involved.
